name: SeaRings
description:
:) Tap the  screen at the right time to go through each Ring  your Seahorses will Change color every time you get a pearl or go through a ring 

You must follow the color pattern on each obstacle to cross it! 

Don't go through the wrong color or the top, bottom of the screen , or you’ll not reach 101 
 to get the Golden Seahorse! :(
